Body:
"""Check that a Cosmology object pickles."""
cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=
    0.96, m_nu=[0.02, 0.1, 0.05], m_nu_type='list', z_mg=[0.0, 1.0], df_mg=
    [0.01, 0.0])
with tempfile.TemporaryFile() as fp:
    pickle.dump(cosmo, fp)
    fp.seek(0)
    cosmo2 = pickle.load(fp)
assert_(ccl.comoving_radial_distance(cosmo, 0.5) == ccl.
    comoving_radial_distance(cosmo2, 0.5))
